title: Cancel a Pending Port-in Request
description: A customer who requested a port-in has changed their mind and wants to cancel it before it completes.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their pending port-in request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the active port-in request.

tasks.description: Submit a cancellation request for the pending port.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uses the tool to cancel the port.

tasks.description: Confirm with the customer that the port has been cancelled and their number will remain with their old carrier.
